scenario_text.value:
(That’s odd. Kaito’s walking around like he’s
searching for something... What could it be?)
What’s up, Kaito?

Oh, I was just wondering where Miu might have
gotten off to.

(Haha, Kaito’s always thinking about Miu,
isn’t he?)
(What should I tell him?)
She went over there.
You are all about Miu.
She went over there.
Oh, well, she went over there.
Great, thanks.

You know, if you need her for something, I’d
be happy to help you find her.

Oh, no, it’s nothing like that. I’m just
worried about her.
Listen, Kaito...

What? What’s with that tone? You got some
some kinda problem with that?
You are all about Miu.

Boy, you sure are all about Miu, aren’t you?
Even with everything we’ve got going on.
Haha, what? You got a problem with that?

(Actually, I do kind of have a problem with
that, but is now the time to bring it up?)

(I’d hate to make trouble before the big
fight, but this might be my only chance...)
(What should I do?)
I do have a problem.
Nope, no problem.
I do have a problem.
Actually, yes. I do have a problem with that.
Oh? What’s that?
Not so fast, Takuma! I got a problem, too!
You too, Dracumon?! What is it?
Nope, no problem.

Nope, no problem. I was just thinking how you
two are so close, it makes me jealous.
Oh...

You might think it’s dumb for me to be
worrying about her right now, but...

...I can’t help it with her. She’s always on
my mind.

Oh, come on, Takuma, out with it already! You
gotta be honest about this sorta thing.
Yeah, but...I don’t know...
Okay, what is it? Let’s hear it.

It’s just, you only ever worry about Miu.
I wish you’d think about yourself sometimes.

Huh? What are you talking about? Who even
cares what happens to—
Actually, I was about to say the same thing.

You always focus on Miu and neglect yourself.
But what if something happens to you?

Wouldn’t that just end up making Miu sad,
too?
I guess...

(It’s not just Miu. We all care about Kaito.
The two of them aren’t alone anymore.)
(But how do I get Kaito to see that?)
We worry about you.
Let me care for Miu.
We worry about you.

We all worry about you, Kaito. Can’t you see
that?
Heh. Well, you shouldn’t waste your time.

And anyway, it’s not like Miu is literally
the only person I care about.

I worry about all of you too. I don’t want
any of you to get hurt. So chill out, okay?
Kaito...

It’s cool, Kaito. I know just what a kind and
thoughtful person you are!
Let me care for Miu.

That’s why I want you to let me be the one to
look out for Miu.
...What?

From now on, I’ll keep her safe so you won’t
have to! That way—

Takuma, are you serious...? Don’t tell me
you’ve got a thing for her!
Huh?

Wait, no! You’ve got it all wrong! I didn’t
mean it like that! I was, uh...just kidding!

What is wrong with you?! Don’t even joke
about that sort of thing!

I’m sorry! Really, I shouldn’t have put it
like that!

Kaito, relax. You get what Takuma was trying
to say, right?

Hmph... Yeah, I know. Guess I just snapped at
him without thinking.
Anyway, look, uh...
I do think of all of you as friends, I guess.
So let me worry about what I want, okay?

Heheh, finally starting to be more honest
about your feelings, Kaito?
Oh, shut up.

I can see how Miu’s gotten stronger, and all
of you too, but I still worry, you know?
